title: Corner Protest
description: Join us for the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday for positive engagement at the SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins.
meeting_location: SW Corner of Drake and College
raw_text:
Join the Corner Protest every Tuesday and Thursday 3:15-5:15 PM
SW Corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins
Positive engagement

PROTECT DEMOCRACY
Right or Left ... we all know this is WRONG!
OMG GOP WTF
WE THE PEOPLE

Thursday, November 13, 2025
3:15 - 5:15 pm
2601 S College Ave, Fort Collins, CO
raw_summary: The image promotes a recurring protest event held every Tuesday and Thursday from 3:15 PM to 5:15 PM at the SW corner of Drake and College in Fort Collins. It emphasizes positive engagement and includes a specific date of Thursday, November 13, 2025, for an instance of the event.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade: Overpass Bannering
description: Join us with your high-visibility protest signs, flags, and a good mood to stand up and fight back for democracy in East Olympia. Let's gather on the bridge to make good trouble.
raw_text:
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
OVERPASS BANNERING
15 NOVEMBER 2025
FROM 12:00 TO 2:00
BOULEVARD RD SE / I-5
EAST OLYMPIA
BRING YOUR HIGH-VISIBILITY PROTEST SIGNS, FLAGS, & A GOOD MOOD, AND JOIN US ON THE BRIDGE TO MAKE GOOD TROUBLE!
DEMOCRACY IS UNDER ATTACK STAND UP FIGHT BACK!
MORE INFORMATION: OLYMPIA INDIVISIBLE, BACKBONECAMPAIGN.ORG, AND THEBLOP.ORG
raw_summary: The flyer announces an event called 'Olympia Visibility Brigade: Overpass Bannering' happening on November 15, 2025. The event will be held from 12:00 PM to 2:00 PM at Boulevard RD SE / I-5 in East Olympia. Participants are encouraged to bring protest signs and flags. Further information can be found through Olympia Indivisible, BackboneCampaign.org, and TheBlop.org.

title: NOW Is the Time to ACT UP!
description: Join us every other Saturday to make a difference. Bring your protest sign or flag and stand with us at Harmony Road & Weitzel. Extras are available.
raw_text:
NOW is the time to ACT UP !
Every other Saturday at the Corner of Harmony Road & Weitzel
9:00-10:30 AM
Bring a protest sign or your flag if you have them. If not, we have extras for you.

Together we can make a difference.

November 15, 2025
9:00-10:30 am
Harmony Rd & Weitzel St
Timnath, CO

Indivisible Timnath
raw_summary: A recurring event held every other Saturday at the intersection of Harmony Road & Weitzel. Participants are encouraged to bring protest signs or flags, with the option for extras provided. The event on November 15, 2025, is from 9:00 to 10:30 AM, organized by Indivisible Timnath.

title: Resistance Art Show
description: Join us for the opening of the Resistance Art Show — where creativity meets civic power. This event celebrates how the First Amendment protects our right to dissent, protest injustice, and imagine a freer world. Experience art that speaks truth to power — and help us plan our next bold act of public resistance.
raw_text:
RESISTANCE ART SHOW
OPENING: SUN, NOV 16, 7 - 9 PM

Join us for the opening of the Resistance Art Show — where creativity meets civic power. This event celebrates how the First Amendment protects our right to dissent, protest injustice, and imagine a freer world. Experience art that speaks truth to power — and help us plan our next bold act of public resistance.

YANT ART SPACE
72-50 AUSTIN STREET
FOREST HILLS NY 11375

QUEENS SAYS NO KINGS
raw_summary: The image is promoting an art show opening titled "Resistance Art Show," occurring on November 16 from 7 to 9 PM. It discusses themes of civic power and protest art, and the location is Yant Art Space, Forest Hills, NY.

title: Remove the Regime
description: Join us for a series of congressional visits, a rally, and a march in Washington, D.C., featuring live entertainment by The Dropkick Murphys. The event aims to advocate for impeachment and removal.

title: Peaceful Protest for Children of Gaza
description: Join us in Loveland for a peaceful protest to stand in solidarity with the Palestinian people on the International Day of Solidarity. Create a picture that represents hope and innocence to bring to the event. Wear black in mourning.
raw_text:
Join Us In Loveland, CO at Veterans Park

12 to 2PM November 29th

The Children of Gaza and all over the world have been innocent victims of crimes perpetrated by adults by war, hate, and abuse. Children and their children are the inherents of the future. Let’s reclaim that promise for them through a peaceful and healing protest.

November 29th is the International Day of Solidarity with the Palestinian people. Since October 2023 the number of Palestinian children killed has surpassed 20,000 (as of 9/6/2025). Please wear black in mourning.

In honor of World Children’s Day Nov. 20th, please create a picture that you will hold at the protest. The picture should signify or symbolize a feeling of hope, and/or innocence, and/or the promises of what childhood should be…
raw_summary: The flyer announces a peaceful protest in Loveland, CO at Veterans Park on November 29th from 12 to 2 PM. It is held in solidarity with Palestinian people, coinciding with the International Day of Solidarity. Participants are encouraged to create a picture representing hope or innocence to hold at the protest. Wearing black is suggested for mourning.
